title: Georgia Firm Recalls Gluten-Free Chicken Nuggets Due To Misbranding And Undeclared Wheat
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan 18, 2013 -King's Delight, a Gainesville, Ga. establishment, is recalling approximately 1,572 pounds of frozen chicken nuggets labeled as gluten-free because they contain wheat, a known allergen that is not declared on the label, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection...
impacted_products: 8-oz. cartons of "APPLEGATE® Naturals Gluten-Free Chicken Nuggets."
